featuredProjects.title: eShop
featuredProjects.description: E-commerce tool used to sell things online. This is a management dashboard for this application

otherProjects.title: Would You Rather
otherProjects.description: A game where a user is asked a question in the form Would you rather [option A] or [option B]? The user can only select one answer. Selecting neither or both is not allowed.

otherProjects.title: My Reads
otherProjects.description: A bookshelf application that allows you to select and categorize books you have read, are currently reading, or want to read. It also allows you to search for new books and add them to your categories or shelves.
